possible_issues: Summaries lack context from longer email chains and discussions
Important details from emails and meetings are often missing from summaries
Key replies and decisions in long threads are skipped in summaries
Summaries ignore the latest messages and leave out deadlines
Insights have been surprisingly useful for catching up fast and prioritizing tasks
Insights consistently surface the busiest days, overdue tasks, and threads to respond to
Recommendations feel overly generic and not tailored to the user's emails
Recommendations can be hit-or-miss, with some being genuinely valuable
The app regularly mixes up names and deadlines, attributing tasks to the wrong person
The app has pulled the wrong date from a thread more than once, requiring verification
